original_text: @evenbetterif @SaysMiss @HeadofEnglish @TeachLearnLeads @Claire_Hill_ I’d urge caution. EQs have a very distinctive meaning in history - their purpose is disciplinary - i.e. they frame a judgement-making analytic journey.
